review: Had a hard time setting this thing up. After it was step up it would loose connection to my internet. My wireless router was only 5ft away. I had to reset the stick a few times. After it finally keep the memory and wouldn't loose connection to the wireless, I got a pop up saying that it was experiencing slow internet. I have 50MPBs down/ and 10up. Not sure why I am having this issue. But once it works, it works well. So 3/5 for now until I am done playing around with it.
